title: National debt of India 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general National debt in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
Maximum National debt in billion U.S. dollars, about 2984.05 was reported at Year 2023
The lowest National debt in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1615.18 was reported at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
